text: Ya phir kya tumhara kehna yeh hai ke Ibrahim , Ismail, Ishaq, Yakub aur aulad e Yakub sab ke sab yahudi thay ya nasrani thay? Kaho: â€œtum zyada jaante ho ya Allah? Us shaks se bada zalim aur kaun hoga jiske zimme Allah ki taraf se ek gawahi ho aur woh usey chupaye? Tumhari harakat se Allah gaafil to nahin hai
